subject: Decisions and Verdicts

Perjury
Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
Doping (Sports)
Baseball
Audio Recordings and Downloads
lead_paragraph: The judge presiding over Barry Bonds’s perjury trial said the voices on the secretly recorded tape, which was discovered on Sunday, were too faint to be used at trial.
snippet: The judge presiding over Barry Bonds’s perjury trial said the voices on the secretly recorded tape, which was discovered on Sunday, were too faint to be used at trial.
